item.title: Unrestricted File Upload in Canteen Management System
item.description: An arbitrary file upload vulnerability in the component /pages/save_user.php of Canteen Management System v1.0 allows attackers to execute arbitrary code via a crafted PHP file.

item.title: Code injection in SimpleJobScript by Niteosoft
item.description: The installer of SimpleJobScript is vulnerable to Remote Command Execution if not completed yet through the parameter url.

item.title: Authenticated SQL injection in Zenphoto v1.5.6 and prior
item.description: Zenphoto 1.5.6 was discovered to contain a SQL injection via the postAlbumSort() function in /zp-core/admin-functions.php.

item.title: Code injection in Zenphoto v1.5.6 and prior
item.description: A PHP code injection vulnerability in /zp-core/setup/index.php of Zenphoto 1.5.6 allows attackers to execute arbitrary code.

item.title: Path traversal in Zenphoto v1.5.6 and prior
item.description: An issue in /zp-core/admin-logs.php of Zenphoto 1.5.6 allows attackers to perform a directory traversal and read arbitrary log files.

item.title: Reflected XSS in Zenphoto v1.5.6 and prior
item.description: A cross site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in /page/search/ of Zenphoto 1.5.6 allows attackers to execute arbitrary web scripts or HTML.

item.title: Unauthenticated SQL injection in SimpleJobScript
item.description: An issue was discovered in Simplejobscript.com SJS through 1.66. There is an unauthenticated SQL injection via the job applications search function. The vulnerable parameter is job_id. The function is getJobApplicationsByJobId(). The file is _lib/class.JobApplication.php.

item.title: Unrestricted file upload in SimpleJobScript
item.description: controllers/page_apply.php in Simplejobscript.com SJS through 1.66 is prone to unauthenticated Remote Code Execution by uploading a PHP script as a resume.

item.title: Unauthenticated SQL injection in SimpleJobScript
item.description: An issue was discovered in Simplejobscript.com SJS before 1.65. There is unauthenticated SQL injection via the search engine. The parameter is landing_location. The function is countSearchedJobs(). The file is _lib/class.Job.php.

item.title: Unauthenticated SQL injection in Wordpress plugin “gallery-images”
item.description: An issue was discovered in the Huge-IT gallery-images plugin before 1.9.0 for WordPress. The headers Client-Ip and X-Forwarded-For are prone to unauthenticated SQL injection. The affected file is gallery-images.php. The affected function is huge_it_image_gallery_ajax_callback().
